title: Introduction to C Programming
details: Learn the fundamentals of C programming with this comprehensive guide for beginners.

title: Introduction to Algorithms
details: Discover the world of algorithms and problem-solving techniques in this introductory course.

title: Introduction to C++ for DSA
details: Master C++ programming and data structures for competitive programming and interviews.

title: Basic Data Structures
details: Build a strong foundation in data structures with practical examples and exercises.

title: Introduction to OOP Python
details: Explore object-oriented programming in Python and create efficient and reusable code.

title: Software Engineering
details: Learn software engineering principles and best practices for developing robust applications.

title: AWS, Cloud Computing
details: Dive into cloud computing and AWS services to deploy and manage scalable applications.

title: Database (MySQL)
details: Master MySQL database management and design for efficient data storage and retrieval.

title: Problem-Solving Part
details: Enhance your problem-solving skills with challenging exercises and real-world scenarios.
